482700.name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2: Panem On Display: The Hunger Games: The Exhibition
482700.description: Join Jennifer Lawrence and the cast for a sneak peek of The Hunger Games: The Exhibition as they experience this incredibly engaging curated mix of props, sets, costumes, holograms and interactive displays. This vast archive to explore includes almost 1,000 props and 46 costumes on loan from the film productions.
482700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
